DOC.brief_summary: To compare analgesic efficacy safety ABT-652 administer twice daily ( BID ) placebo subject osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee .
DOC.brief_title: A Study ABT-652 Adults With Osteoarthritis Pain Knee
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria History OA knee joint meeting American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) Clinical Radiographic criterion , Pain score require protocol Screening Baseline Willing washout analgesic follow treatment plan , visit schedule study procedure . Exclusion Criteria History sensitivity histamine medication , acetaminophen ( paracetamol ) , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) Active gastrointestinal ( GI ) disease , GI bleed GI ulceration , history GI bleeding GI ulceration last 6 month History major psychiatric disorder Diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis , autoimmune disorder , arthritis osteoarthritis involve study joint , painful syndrome could interfere assessment pain study joint Any cardiac , respiratory , neurological medical condition illness well control treatment
